innerText: (19) 4. Ariyamaggavaggo
1. Ariyamaggasuttaṃ

children: . ‘‘Ariyamaggañca
vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi anariyamaggañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe… katamo ca, bhikkhave, anariyo maggo? Pāṇātipāto…pe… micchādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, anariyo maggo.
innerText: 189. ‘‘Ariyamaggañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi anariyamaggañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe… katamo ca, bhikkhave, anariyo maggo? Pāṇātipāto…pe… micchādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, anariyo maggo.

children: ‘‘Katamo ca
, bhikkhave, ariyo maggo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe… sammādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyo maggo’’ti. Paṭhamaṃ.
innerText: ‘‘Katamo ca , bhikkhave, ariyo maggo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe… sammādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyo maggo’’ti. Paṭhamaṃ.
2. Kaṇhamaggasuttaṃ

children: . ‘‘Kaṇhamaggañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi sukkamaggañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe… katamo ca, bhikkhave, kaṇho maggo? Pāṇātipāto…pe… micchādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, kaṇho maggo.
innerText: 190. ‘‘Kaṇhamaggañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi sukkamaggañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe… katamo ca, bhikkhave, kaṇho maggo? Pāṇātipāto…pe… micchādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, kaṇho maggo.
‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sukko maggo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe… sammādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sukko maggo’’ti. Dutiyaṃ.
3. Saddhammasuttaṃ

children: . ‘‘Saddhammañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi asaddhammañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe… katamo ca, bhikkhave, asaddhammo? Pāṇātipāto…pe… micchādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaddhammo.
innerText: 191. ‘‘Saddhammañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi asaddhammañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe… katamo ca, bhikkhave, asaddhammo? Pāṇātipāto…pe… micchādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaddhammo.

children: ‘‘Katamo
ca, bhikkhave, saddhammo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe… sammādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, saddhammo’’ti. Tatiyaṃ.
innerText: ‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, saddhammo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe… sammādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, saddhammo’’ti. Tatiyaṃ.
4. Sappurisadhammasuttaṃ

children: . ‘‘Sappurisadhammañca
vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi asappurisadhammañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe… katamo ca, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo? Pāṇātipāto…pe… micchādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo.
innerText: 192. ‘‘Sappurisadhammañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi asappurisadhammañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe… katamo ca, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo? Pāṇātipāto…pe… micchādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo.
‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe… sammādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sappurisadhammo’’ti. Catutthaṃ.
5. Uppādetabbadhammasuttaṃ

children: . ‘‘Uppādetabbañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi na uppādetabbañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe… katamo ca, bhikkhave, na uppādetabbo
dhammo? Pāṇātipāto…pe… micchādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, na uppādetabbo dhammo.
innerText: 193. ‘‘Uppādetabbañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi na uppādetabbañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe… katamo ca, bhikkhave, na uppādetabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipāto…pe… micchādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, na uppādetabbo dhammo.
‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, uppādetabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe… sammādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, uppādetabbo dhammo’’ti. Pañcamaṃ.
6. Āsevitabbadhammasuttaṃ

children: . ‘‘Āsevitabbañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi nāsevitabbañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe… katamo ca, bhikkhave, nāsevitabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipāto…pe… micchādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, nāsevitabbo dhammo.
innerText: 194. ‘‘Āsevitabbañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi nāsevitabbañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe… katamo ca, bhikkhave, nāsevitabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipāto…pe… micchādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, nāsevitabbo dhammo.

children: ‘‘Katamo
ca, bhikkhave, āsevitabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe… sammādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, āsevitabbo dhammo’’ti. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
innerText: ‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, āsevitabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe… sammādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, āsevitabbo dhammo’’ti. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
7. Bhāvetabbadhammasuttaṃ

children: . ‘‘Bhāvetabbañca
vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi na bhāvetabbañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe… katamo ca, bhikkhave, na bhāvetabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipāto
…pe… micchādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, na bhāvetabbo dhammo.
innerText: 195. ‘‘Bhāvetabbañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi na bhāvetabbañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe… katamo ca, bhikkhave, na bhāvetabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipāto …pe… micchādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, na bhāvetabbo dhammo.
‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, bhāvetabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe… sammādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhāvetabbo dhammo’’ti. Sattamaṃ.
8. Bahulīkātabbasuttaṃ

children: . ‘‘Bahulīkātabbañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi na bahulīkātabbañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe… katamo ca, bhikkhave, na bahulīkātabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipāto…pe… micchādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, na bahulīkātabbo dhammo.
innerText: 196. ‘‘Bahulīkātabbañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi na bahulīkātabbañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe… katamo ca, bhikkhave, na bahulīkātabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipāto…pe… micchādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, na bahulīkātabbo dhammo.

children: ‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, bahulīkātabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipātā
veramaṇī…pe… sammādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bahulīkātabbo dhammo’’ti. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
innerText: ‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, bahulīkātabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe… sammādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bahulīkātabbo dhammo’’ti. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
9. Anussaritabbasuttaṃ

children: . ‘‘Anussaritabbañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi nānussaritabbañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe… katamo ca, bhikkhave, nānussaritabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipāto…pe… micchādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, nānussaritabbo dhammo.
innerText: 197. ‘‘Anussaritabbañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi nānussaritabbañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe… katamo ca, bhikkhave, nānussaritabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipāto…pe… micchādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, nānussaritabbo dhammo.

children: ‘‘Katamo
ca, bhikkhave, anussaritabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe… sammādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, anussaritabbo dhammo’’ti. Navamaṃ.
innerText: ‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, anussaritabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe… sammādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, anussaritabbo dhammo’’ti. Navamaṃ.
10. Sacchikātabbasuttaṃ

children: . ‘‘Sacchikātabbañca
vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi na sacchikātabbañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe… katamo ca, bhikkhave, na sacchikātabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipāto…pe… micchādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, na sacchikātabbo dhammo.
innerText: 198. ‘‘Sacchikātabbañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi na sacchikātabbañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe… katamo ca, bhikkhave, na sacchikātabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipāto…pe… micchādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, na sacchikātabbo dhammo.

children: ‘‘Katamo
ca, bhikkhave, sacchikātabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe… sammādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sacchikātabbo dhammo’’ti. Dasamaṃ.
innerText: ‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sacchikātabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe… sammādiṭṭhi – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sacchikātabbo dhammo’’ti. Dasamaṃ.
Ariyamaggavaggo catuttho.
